data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "**Delivery Confirmation:** Driver delivers furniture. Customer signs digital delivery receipt on driver's phone. Photo of item at doorstep if customer not home (contactless delivery with proof). Signature + photo stored for 90 days in case of dispute.". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.
